citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:05 pm on 14 May
2021. Facility representative was not present at petting zoo or office. The petting zoo was not open and no petting zoo
employees were present. Left a phone message with facility representative at 2:09 pm, waited 30 minutes. Facility
representative returned call at 2:52 pm and was out of town for the afternoon.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:05 pm on 14 May 
2021. Facility representative was not present at petting zoo or office.  The petting zoo was not open and no petting zoo 
employees were present.  Left a phone message with facility representative at 2:09 pm, waited 30 minutes.  Facility 
representative returned call at 2:52 pm and was out of town for the afternoon. 
 
 
 
End Section
